member.name: T:LaviniaApi.Controllers.ElectionController
member.summary: Controller that serves data regarding political elections in various levels, for the Mandater project at the University of Oslo, department of political science

member.name: M:LaviniaApi.Controllers.ElectionController.#ctor(LaviniaApi.Data.ElectionContext,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{LaviniaApi.Controllers.ElectionController})
member.summary: Constructor for the ElectionController, enables database access and logging
member.param: ElectionContext object that allows access to the database
Logger that gives information about the context of a log message

member.name: M:LaviniaApi.Controllers.ElectionController.GetCountries(System.Nullable{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Default path method that returns a list of shallow Country objects, showing which countries the API has data on. If deep is specified it returns all data.
member.param: Optional boolean parameter, the method returns a deep list if true
member.returns: List of countries

member.name: M:LaviniaApi.Controllers.ElectionController.GetCountry(System.String,System.Nullable{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Returns either a shallow or a deep Country object, where a deep object contains the entire hierarchy of data from the country down.
member.param: Optional boolean parameter, the method returns a deep list if true
Two character country code, ISO 3166-1 alpha-2
member.returns: Country

member.name: M:LaviniaApi.Controllers.ElectionController.GetElectionType(System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Returns either a shallow or a deep ElectionType object, where a deep object contains the entire hierarchy of data from the ElectionType down.
member.param: Optional boolean parameter, the method returns a deep list if true
Two character country code, ISO 3166-1 alpha-2
member.returns: ElectionType of a given country

member.name: M:LaviniaApi.Controllers.ElectionController.GetElection(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Nullable{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Returns either a shallow or a deep Election object, where a deep object contains the entire hierarchy of data from the Election down.
member.param: Optional boolean parameter, the method returns a deep list if true
Two character country code, ISO 3166-1 alpha-2
member.returns: Election of a given type and a given year for a given country

member.name: T:LaviniaApi.Controllers.NOController
member.summary: Controller that serves data regarding political elections in various levels, for the Mandater project at the University of Oslo, department of political science

member.name: M:LaviniaApi.Controllers.NOController.GetVotes(System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns a list of all Party votes that meet the required parameters.
member.param: One to N character party code
member.returns: Party votes meeting the requirements

member.name: M:LaviniaApi.Controllers.NOController.GetPreviousVotes(System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns a list of all Party votes from a number of elections before the specified year.
member.param: One to N character party code
member.returns: Party votes for a number of elections

member.name: M:LaviniaApi.Controllers.NOController.GetMetrics(System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.String)
member.summary: Returns a list of all District metrics that matches the required parameters.
member.returns: District metrics matching the requirements

member.name: M:LaviniaApi.Controllers.NOController.GetPreviousMetrics(System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.String)
member.summary: Returns a list of all District metrics from a number of elections before the specified year.
member.param: Number of District metrics to return
member.returns: District metrics for a number of elections

member.name: M:LaviniaApi.Controllers.NOController.GetParameters(System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Returns a list of all Election parameters that matches the required parameters.
member.returns: Election parameters matching the requirements

member.name: M:LaviniaApi.Controllers.NOController.GetPreviousParameters(System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Returns a list of all Election parameters from a number of elections before the specified year.
member.returns: Election parameters for a number of years

member.name: M:LaviniaApi.Data.CustomValidation.ValidateCountry(LaviniaApi.Models.Country,System.Collections.Generic.HashSet{System.Int32})
member.summary: Checks whether the given country is a valid model, and then proceeds to look through any connected models that are not in the checkedModels set and ensure that they all result in a valid model.
member.param: A set of models that has been checked already.

member.name: M:LaviniaApi.Data.ElectionInitializer.Initialize(LaviniaApi.Data.ElectionContext,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger)
member.summary: Initializes the database, if the db is empty this method will build a model to seed it.

member.summary: Initializes the database, if the db is empty this method will build a model to seed it.

members.member:
API V1
Enum representing the available methods of seat calculation for political systems given a voting district/circuit.

member.name: F:LaviniaApi.Utilities.Algorithm.Undefined
member.summary: Algorithm not defined

member.name: F:LaviniaApi.Utilities.Algorithm.ModifiedSainteLagues
member.summary: The Modified Sainte-Lag端e method in accordance with the Norwegian system. TODO: More accurate description of Modified Sainte-Lag端e

member.name: F:LaviniaApi.Utilities.Algorithm.SainteLagues
member.summary: Normal Sainte-Lag端e method TODO: More accurate description of Sainte-Lag端e

member.name: F:LaviniaApi.Utilities.Algorithm.DHondt
member.summary: D'Hondt method TODO: More accurate description of D'Hondt

member.name: T:LaviniaApi.Utilities.AlgorithmUtilities
member.summary: Utility class to make operations surrounding the Algorithm enum more practical

members.member:
API V1
Accepts a string and returns the matching algorithm enum. If no matching enum can be found it throws an ArgumentException.
The name of the algorithm to be converted. An algorithm enum

API V2
Accepts a string and returns the matching algorithm enum. If no matching enum can be found it throws an ArgumentException.
The name of the algorithm to be converted. An algorithm enum

API V1
Accepts an algorithm enum and returns our internal textual representation of that algorithm. If there is not any known textual representation of it an ArgumentException is thrown.
The Algorithm enum to be converted. The name of the algorithm enum

member.name: M:LaviniaApi.Utilities.AlgorithmUtilities.IsAlgorithm(System.String)
member.summary: Checks whether the name matches any algorithm we know.
member.returns: True if we have an enum for the algorithm, false otherwise.

members.member:
API V1
Attempts to convert the name to an algorithm. If it is successful it returns true and pushes the Algorithm to the algorithm variable. Otherwise it returns false and pushes Algorithm.Undefined to the algorithm variable.
The name of the algorithm. Where the algorithm should be returned. True if successful, false otherwise.

API V2
Attempts to convert the name to an algorithm. If it is successful it returns true and pushes the Algorithm to the algorithm variable. Otherwise it returns false and pushes Algorithm.Undefined to the algorithm variable.
The name of the algorithm. Where the algorithm should be returned. True if successful, false otherwise.

member.name: M:LaviniaApi.Utilities.CsvUtilities.CsvToList(System.String)
member.summary: Reads any .csv file in the default format specified at https://www.valgresultat.no and creates a list of simple string objects based on the schema.
member.param: The relative or absolute path of the file being read, has to be .csv and cannot contain semicolon (;) in any of its fields as that is the delimiter used.
member.returns: A list of VDModel objects that can be used for simple in-memory queries or populating a database.

member.name: M:LaviniaApi.Utilities.CsvUtilities.CsvToVdArray(System.String)
member.summary: Reads any .csv file in the default format specified at https://www.valgresultat.no and creates an array of VDModel objects based on the schema.
member.param: The relative or absolute path of the file being read, has to be .csv and cannot contain semicolon (;) in any of its fields as that is the delimiter used.
member.returns: An array of VDModel objects that can be used for simple in-memory queries or populating a database.

member.name: M:LaviniaApi.Utilities.ETNameUtilities.NameToCode(System.String)
member.summary: Accepts a string and returns the matching code. If no matching enum can be found it throws an ArgumentException.
member.param: The name of the ElectionType code.
member.returns: A string code

member.name: M:LaviniaApi.Utilities.ETNameUtilities.CodeToName(System.String)
member.summary: Accepts an ElectionType code and returns the full name. If the code is not recognized an ArgumentException is thrown.
member.param: The ElectionType code to be converted.
member.returns: The full name of the ElectionType

member.name: M:LaviniaApi.Utilities.ETNameUtilities.IsElectionType(System.String)
member.summary: Checks whether the name matches any ElectionType we know.
member.returns: True if the name is in our dictionary, false otherwise.

member.name: M:LaviniaApi.Utilities.ETNameUtilities.TryParse(System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Attempts to convert the name to a code. If it is successful it returns true and pushes the code to the code variable. Otherwise it returns false and pushes null to the code variable.
member.param: Where the code should be returned.
member.returns: True if successful, false otherwise.

member.name: T:LaviniaApi.Utilities.FieldParser
member.summary: A class for parsing the fields from a string array.

member.name: M:LaviniaApi.Utilities.FieldParser.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: The constructor takes the path of the file to be parsed, used to provide meaningful exception information.
member.param: Path of the file being parsed
The separator used to separate the fields in the file

member.name: M:LaviniaApi.Utilities.FieldParser.ParseLength(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Verifies that the string array matches the expected length.
member.returns: A string array containing the extracted fields
member.exception: Is thrown if the line has incorrect length

members.member:
API V1
Parses a string to any of the known algorithms.
String representation of the algorith Name of the field The Algorithm parsed from the string Is thrown if the string does not match any known algorithm

API V2
Parses a string to any of the known algorithms.
String representation of the algorith Name of the field The Algorithm parsed from the string Is thrown if the string does not match any known algorithm

member.name: M:LaviniaApi.Utilities.FieldParser.ParseInt(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Parses a string to an integer value.
member.returns: The integer parsed from the string
member.exception: Is thrown if the string cannot be parsed to an integer

member.name: M:LaviniaApi.Utilities.FieldParser.ParseDouble(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Prases a string to a duble value.
member.returns: The double parsed from the string
member.exception: Is thrown if the string cannot be parsed to a double

member.name: M:LaviniaApi.Utilities.FieldParser.ParseString(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Verifies that a string is within certain length restrictions. Checks if the string length is greater or equal to the minLength (inclusive), and that it is less than the maxLength (exclusive). Set the maxLength to -1 to allow unrestricted length.

member.summary: Takes a list of ElectionFormat and builds a list of Elections

member.summary: Takes a list of ElectionTypeFormat and builds a list of ElectionTypes

member.name: M:LaviniaApi.Utilities.ModelBuilder.BuildElectionParameters(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{LaviniaApi.Utilities.ElectionFormat},System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{LaviniaApi.Models.DistrictMetrics})
member.summary: Takes a list of ElectionFormat, an election type and a list of DistrictMetrics, and returns a list of ElectionParameters. The returned list contains information about which parameters were used for each election.

member.summary: Takes an ElectionFormat, extracts information about the algorithm used and returns an AlgorithmParameter
member.param: ElectionFormat - Information about a particular election
member.returns: AlgorithmParameters - Parameters used in the election

member.name: M:LaviniaApi.Utilities.ModelBuilder.BuildPartyVotes(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{LaviniaApi.Utilities.ResultFormat},System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Takes a list of ResultFormat, an election type and an election year, and returns a list of PartyVotes. The returned list contains information about how many votes each party got in each district for a particular election.
member.param: Which year the election was held
member.returns: List of PartyVotes
